text: Tomadera karo yakhana mrtyura samaya upasthita haya, se yadi kichu dhana-sampada tyaga kare yaya, tabe tara jan'ya osiyata kara bidhibad'dha kara halo, pita-mata o nikatatniyadera jan'ya inasaphera sathe paraheyagaradera jan'ya e nirdesa jaruri.
